Entries.Introduction: Hey, I'm Samantha, but you can call me Sam. Good to meet you.$h
Entries.Mon8: 'Sam' is short for 'Samantha'.$l#$e#Maybe that was obvious.
Entries.Wed10: Um... I just wanted to say... You look nice today.$l^@. Hey buddy. You look like you're full of energy today!
Entries.Fri10: The older I get the more attached I feel to the valley.#$b#Although I could be biased... for a certain reason.$l#$e#So, how are you doing today?$h
Entries.fall_Fri10: I think I've grown to like the country more than the city.$h#$b#Although I could be biased... for a certain reason.$l#$e#So, how are you doing today?$h
Entries.Mon8: 'Sam' is short for 'Samantha'.$l#$e#Maybe that was obvious.
Entries.winter_7: One time, Gus fell in the river during the Ice Festival. We had to build a huge fire in the saloon to dry him out.#$e#We were all worried we'd never taste his famous spaghetti ever again.#$e#
Entries.fall_Mon2: I like taking walks in the forest this time of year. The temperature is so comfortable#$e#...$h

Entries.sam_work: 40/40 40 41 41 42 42 41 41/40/%Sam's on the clock... better not get her in trouble.

Entries.Sam0: I'm going to be really happy as your wife, @.$l#$e#I'm excited.

Entries.fall_Thu: Maybe I've spoiled the kids a bit. They've never had to do any chores.#$e#I guess I want them to be able to enjoy their childhood while they still can. Well, Sam's basically a woman now, though.#$b#I hope she hasn't grow up to be lazy. That won't do.$s#$e#Being a parent isn't very easy.
Entries.winter_Thu_inlaw_Sam: How's Sam doing? I have to admit, there's less cooking and cleaning to do since she moved out...
Entries.winter_Thu: Sam makes a lot of noise with that music of hers. I hope it doesn't disturb the neighbors.
Entries.Thu6: Where does all the time go? *sigh*#$e#I remember when Sam was a little baby wearing diapers. She was such a cute little kid.$s#$e#Don't tell her I said that.$h#$e#You must really like talking to me, huh?

Entries.winter_Sam: I've given up on being a musician. I'm a family woman now!

Entries.TwoKids_3: I never thought I'd become such a family woman, but I'm really satisfied with what we've built here. Life is going great.$l
Entries.OneKid_1: It's weird, but I really like being a mother!$h

Entries.fall_11: 1000 SamHouse 15 13 0 "I gotta go visit Uncle Doctor today... Great.$7"/1130 Hospital 14 15 3 sam_gameboy/1330 Hospital 4 6 1 "I'm a healthy girl, doc. Can I go now? This is boring."/1600 Town 11 94 2 "I just got out of the doctor's office. Completely healthy and vigorous, just as I expected.$h"/2100 SamHouse 22 13 1

Entries.Mon: I wanna be just like my big sister when I grow up!$h#$e#Okay! Bye!
